abstract: NFL Roundup; Houston Texans director of college scouting Mike Maccagnan emerges as front-runner in New York Jets search for new general manager; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Mike Maccagnan, Houston’s director of college scouting, was scheduled to speak with the Jets for a second time on Friday.
snippet: Mike Maccagnan, Houston’s director of college scouting, was scheduled to speak with the Jets for a second time on Friday.

headline.main: Jets Focus on Texans Executive in G.M. Hunt
headline.seo: Mike Maccagnan Emerges as Favorite for Jets’ G.M. Position
headline.print_headline: Jets Focus on Texans Executive in G.M. Hunt
